title: White Heart
description:
A white heart emoji, used for love and affection. Also commonly used to discuss someone passing away.

An alternative character known as White Heart Suit is also available, but not intended to have an emoji appearance.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the white heart emoji embodies purity, elegance, and a gentle form of affection. Its pristine white surface boasts a soft, subtle gradient that gives it a luminous, almost ethereal glow, a hallmark of Apple's sophisticated 3D rendering. The perfectly symmetrical, rounded shape, highlighted with delicate light reflections, communicates a pure and sincere sentiment, often used to convey innocent love, peace, or a desire for something clean and unblemished.
